scripts.test:codegen:gql-tada: n=0; until [ $n -ge 3 ]; do (gql-tada generate-schema http://localhost:8000/subgraphs/name/kit-integration-tests && gql-tada turbo && gql-tada generate-output) && break || { n=$((n+1)); sleep 5; }; done
scripts.compile: mkdir -p .generated && (test -f .generated/subgraph-env || echo 'SUBGRAPH=kit:' > .generated/subgraph-env) && settlemint scs subgraph build --ipfs=https://ipfs.console.settlemint.com | tee /dev/tty | grep -o 'Qm[a-zA-Z0-9]*' | tail -1 | tee .generated/subgraph-hash.txt | xargs -I {} echo 'SUBGRAPH=kit:{}' > .generated/subgraph-env
